item.description:
Yes, the picnic/bbq is still on...don't let a little "chance" of rain scare you away!
See you there.


Date: Saturday, June 27, 2009
Time: 12 noon - 6pm
Place: Arsenal Park
485 Arsenal St.
Watertown, MA 02472

Cost: $12 (if you rsvp by June 26th 6pm)
$15 (if late rsvp or walk in)

Pay at the picnic registration table.

Join us for our 2nd annual picnic/bbq. We will be serving a delicious bbq:

  • 1/4 lb burgers
  • hot dogs, kielbasa
  • chicken wings
  • fish balls
  • vegetable kabobs
  • vietnamese fresh spring rolls
  • potato & pasta salads
  • watermelon
  • ice cold drinks


We have rented a covered picnic area (tables 11, 12, 13). Come and meet other meetup members and have some fun. The park also has tennis and basketball courts nearby and we will set up a volleyball net on the playing field. Bring a frisbee, lawn chair or picnic blanket and join us for a good time.

There is free parking. If you need a ride, please note that in your rsvp and someone may be able to give you a ride. You can take the bus to the park as well.

By MBTA Bus - The 70 and 70A buses stop on Arsenal Street, not too far from Arsenal Park. (There are other bus lines that stop a few blocks away, such as the 86 and 64.) Please visit http://mbta.com... to plan your trip.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for covered picnic area near the water fountain- Picnic tables 11, 12, 13

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Picnic/BBQ
